name: Isaac THOMAS, Petitioner v. UNITED STATES

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
Isaac THOMAS, Petitioner
v.
UNITED STATES
attorneys: On petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eleventh Circuit. Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis and petition for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eleventh Circuit for further consideration in light of Rehaif v. United States , 588 U.S. ----, 139 S.Ct. 2191, 204 L.Ed.2d 594 (2019).
casebody.head_matter:
Isaac THOMAS, Petitioner
v.
UNITED STATES
No. 19-5025
Supreme Court of the United States.
October 15, 2019
On petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eleventh Circuit. Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis and petition for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eleventh Circuit for further consideration in light of Rehaif v. United States , 588 U.S. ----, 139 S.Ct. 2191, 204 L.Ed.2d 594 (2019).
